resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103902</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103902</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206944</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">African-American Sheet Arts, 1850-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Afrikanisch-Amerikanische Blatt-Künste, 
1850-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Afro-américains de Feuille, 1850-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Africano-Americanas Da Folha, 1850-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti Africano-Americane Del Foglio, 1850-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφρικανικός-αμερικανικά τέχνες φύλλων, 1850-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes Africano-Americanos De la Hoja, 1850-1920</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">contains 1,300 pieces of sheet music including songs from antebellum blackface minstrelsy, the abolitionist movement, the novel Uncle Tom's Cabin, African-American soldiers in the Civil War, emancipated slaves, Reconstruction, and the northern migration of African Americans.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">enthält 1.300 Stücke Blattmusik einschließlich 
Liede vom antebellum blackface Minstrelsy, die abolitionist Bewegung, 
Roman Onkel Toms Cabin, Afrikanisch-Amerikanische Soldaten im 
Bürgerkrieg, in den emanzipierten Sklaven, in der Rekonstruktion und 
in der Nordmigration der afrikanischen Amerikaner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">contient 1.300 morceaux de musique de feuille 
comprenant des chansons de minstrelsy d'avant-guerre de blackface, du 
mouvement d'abolitionniste, de la carlingue d'oncle Tom de 
roman, des soldats afro-américains dans la guerre civile, des esclaves 
émancipés, de la reconstruction, et du transfert nordique des 
Américains africains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contem 1.300 partes de música da folha including 
canções do minstrelsy antebellum do blackface, o movimento do 
abolitionist, Cabine da novela do tio Tom, soldados 
Africano-Americanos na guerra civil, nos escravos emancipated, no 
reconstruction, e na migração do norte de americanos africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">contiene 1.300 parte di musica del foglio compreso
le canzoni dal minstrelsy antebellum del blackface, il movimento di 
abolitionist, la Cabin dello zio il Tom, soldati Africano-Americani 
del romanzo nella guerra civile, negli schiavi emancipated, nella 
ricostruzione e nell'espansione nordica degli Americani africani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιέχει 1.300 κομμάτια της μουσικής φύλλων 
συμπεριλαμβανομένων των τραγουδιών από το προπολεμικό blackface
minstrelsy, τη μετακίνηση ρεφορμιστών, τη νέα καμπίνα θείου 
Tom, τους αφρικανικός-αμερικανικούς στρατιώτες στον εμφύλιο 
πόλεμο, τους χειραφετημένους σκλάβους, την αναδημιουργία, και τη 
βόρεια μετανάστευση αφρικανικών Αμερικανών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">contiene 1.300 pedazos de música de la hoja 
incluyendo canciones de la trova antebellum del blackface, el 
movimiento del abolitionist, Cabin de tío Tom, soldados 
Africano-Americanos de la novela en la guerra civil, los esclavos 
emancipated, la reconstrucción, y la migración norteña de 
americanos africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206944</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103902</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/african-american-sheet-arts-1850-1920</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
